dialogs.name: not dead
dialogs.dialog: I'm not just missing... I'm dead.

dialogs.name: axe
dialogs.dialog: Yes, you are getting there! Now find a name.

dialogs.name: book
dialogs.dialog: That book was there, when I died... but where is the weapon?

dialogs.name: help me
dialogs.dialog: Help me Morpheus, you're my only hope.
